title: Bespoke Interior? Custom removable kitchen pod and table?

posts.content:
Hi all

We would like to get a removable kitchen pod and table for our bus, but all the ones we can find for sale are modern in design and wouldn't suit our interior. Can anyone recommend somewhere that would do a good job of making a custom one for us? We are based in the SW near Taunton.

Found this on FB

http://www.sjhjoinery.com/

Any other suggestions?

I had a really good conversation at Bus Fest with Adrian of ATT http://www.allthingstimber.com/index.php - his stuff is fantastic and he is a lovely bloke. The only down side is that he isn't very local. Does anyone have any other suggestions for people who could do this job for me?

Dave,

Here you go, this is the kind of stuff i can make, can also make other stuff.

Ive made a sundial interior before in the past and have the hinges still so its up to you.

I spoke to chap a while ago, might have been you ?

Did you want the units under the window next to the Rn R bed ?

Ive been flat out decorating my flat this year and not much time for the interior but i've had viewings and think itll sell soon so ill have a bit more time.

viewtopic.php?f=2&t=98166&start=15

Jason

PS

im only up the road in Bristol

Hi Jason. We haven't spoken before so it must have been someone else.

Yes - We are thinking of units under the windows next to the RnR bed - with a table above. Maybe also a fold-down hob on the inside of the door. Also interested in any other ideas anyone else has



Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
